body: Does anyone know how how many days does it take for an infraction to get replied?
body_tagged: Does anyone know how how many days does it take for an infraction to get replied?
title: Infraction

replies.body: There is no exact amount of days. When a Sr.Staff member sees it, they will reply back.
replies.body_tagged: There is no exact amount of days. When a Sr.Staff member sees it, they will reply back.

replies.body:
Haha, it seems like someone else got false banned..
:/
